title: Textile, "Fables of Fontaine", ca. 1810
medium: Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.
inscribed:
1. Signature in the scene illustrating the oak and the reed, "Buquet  Sc".
2. An 'R' at the left and the right edges signifying "rapport" indicating the repeat when lengths were sewn together correctly. .
dimensions:
Warp: 93cm (36 1/2in.)
Weft: 79cm (31in.) (edges cut).
Height of repeat: 56.5cm (22 1/4in)
Width of roller: 77cm (30 1/4in).
description: Four scenes(each captioned in French) illustrating one of the fables. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph: Textile, "Fables of Fontaine", ca. 1810.Printed by engraved roller on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-166.
